dmca.title: Notice of Claimed Infringement
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: James R. Duby, Jr. [mailto:Jim@Dubylaw.com] 
Posted At: Friday, October 27, 2006 6:27 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Notice of Claimed Infringement
Subject: Notice of Claimed Infringement



 

DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC

 

ATTORNEYS

 

3511 COOLIDGE ROAD

 

SUITE 200

 

EAST LANSING, MICHIGAN 48823

 

(517) 371-9835

 

FAX (517) 371-9840

 

E-MAIL Jim@Dubylaw.com <mailto:Jim@Dubylaw.com> 

 

October 27, 2006

 

 

 Andrea Almeida

 Associate General Counsel

The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110

Dallas, Texas 75207

 

 

Re: NOTIFICATION OF INFRINGEMENT OF TECHSMITH CORPORATION

 CAMTASIA and CAMTASIA STUDIO SOFTWARE PROGRAMS

 

 

1.        Please be advised that we are intellectual property counsel for
TechSmith Corporation who is the owner of the copyrights in and to its
CAMTASIA and CAMTASIA STUDIO software programs and the owner of the U.S.
federally registered famous marks CAMTASIA, Reg. No. 2,488,689 and
CAMTASIA STUDIO, Reg. No. 2, 900,325.  

 

2.        We have good faith belief that the site www.devzone.info
<http://www.devzone.info/>  and specifically located at 
www.devzone.info/camstudio <http://www.devzone.info/camstudio>  is
currently displaying/posting an unauthorized derivative of  TechSmith
Corporation's CAMTASIA and CAMTASISTUDIO computer software programs and
related marks for the sale of the same at a reduced price of $9.97
without the permission of TechSmith Corporation, specifically at 
www.devzone.info <http://www.devzone.info/>   and specifically located
at  www.devzone.info/camstudio <http://www.devzone.info/camstudio>  , a
scanned image of which is attached.  

 

3.        TechSmith Corporation has publicly distributed its CAMTASIA and
CAMTASIA STUDIO copyrightable software programs under its  federally
registered famous marks CAMTASIA and  CAMTASIA STUDIO since at least
November 5, 1999 and worldwide thereafter.  For a full description of
TechSmith Corporation's CAMTASIA and CAMTASIA STUDIO software program
and related products go to www.techsmith.com <http://www.techsmith.com/>
.  

 

4.        The infringing CAMSTUDIO STUDIO program can be viewed and
downloaded, and/or purchased without TechSmith Corporation's permission
in a manner at www.devzone.info <http://www.devzone.info/>  and
specifically located at www.devzone.info/camstudio
<http://www.devzone.info/camstudio> , a scanned image of which is
attached.  

 

5.        Please contact us on behalf of the Complaining Party TechSmith
Corporation at:  

 

DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC

James R. Duby, Jr.

3511 Coolidge Road, Suite 200

East Lansing, MI  48823

517-371-9835 - DD Phone

517-371-9840 - Fax

Jim@Dubylaw.com <mailto:Jim@Dubylaw.com> 

Intellectual Property Counsel for TechSmith Corporation

 

6.        Please use this Notice of Copyright and Trademark Infringement
to take all steps necessary to remove and/or block access to the
infringing CAMSTUDIO program and links located on the  www.devzone.info
<http://www.devzone.info/>  and specifically located at  
www.devzone.info/camstudio <http://www.devzone.info/camstudio> , a
scanned image of which is attached.  

 

The statements contained herein are accurate and we are authorized to
act on behalf of the copyright and trademark owner TechSmith
Corporation, said statements being made under penalty of perjury.  

 

 

Very truly yours,

DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC

/James R. Duby, Jr. /

James R. Duby, Jr.

CONFIDENTIAL AND PRIVILEGED: The information contained in this message
(including any attachments) may be attorney client privileged and
confidential information solely for use by the intended recipient. This
message is for contact purposes only and does not constitute an
electronic signature or an intent to contract. If the reader of this
message is not the intended recipient, the reader is notified that any
use, dissemination, distribution or copying of the communication is
strictly prohibited. If you have received this communication in error,
please immediately notify DUBY & ASSOCIATES, PLC by telephone at
517-371-9835.

FEDERAL TAX NOTICE: In accordance with the Department of Treasury
Circular 230, please be advised that any statements contained herein
(including any attachments hereto) are not intended to be used, and may
not be used by you or any other person, for the purpose of avoiding
penalties that may be imposed under federal tax law.
